features: 【NOISE REDUCTION ABILITY】The Homelazy wireless lavalier mic is equipped with super noise reduction tech, which can intelligently filter out the background noise and unwanted audio interferences. This design of lapel microphone ensures that your recordings or presentations are crystal clear. With clear voice clarity and reduced distractions, making wireless lapel mic ideal for interviews, video production, public speaking and other professional applications.

【EFFORTLESS CONNECTION】Forget about the hassle of complicated setups and APP installations, the system of this wireless lapel microphone for iphone offers a straightforward and hassle-free connection process. Just simply plug the microphone receiver into your compatible devices, and it instantly establishes a stable wireless connection with the lapel microphone wireless. This streamlined setup saves time and allows you to focus on your content without any technical distractions.

【WIDE SIGNAL RANGE】The extended signal range can enhance the mobility of lavalier microphone. Enjoy the freedom of movement during your recordings or presentations. The signal range is up to 50 ft, Homelazy microphone for iphone grants you the flexibility to move around without being tethered by cumbersome cables. Whether you're conducting an interview, or recording a vlog, the wireless design ensures you stay connected with your audience, enhancing your overall performance.

【BATTERY POWERED】Stay powered up for extended periods with the microphone's long-lasting battery life. The receiver's large capacity battery enables long usage for up to 4.5 hours on a single charge. The system of wireless microphones for iphone is designed with on-the-go charging capability, allowing you to recharge the receiver while using.

【SUITABLE MODEL】This wireless lav mic is thoughtfully engineered to be compatible with devices featuring a lightning port, this compatibility extends the usage of lapel mic to a wide range of modern smartphones, tablets and other audio devices. You'll receive 2 wireless microphones and one receiver, please feel free to contact us if you have any questions about this wireless mic for iphone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have for quality audio.
reviews.reviewText: I recently bought this wireless microphone on Amazon for better audio quality for my content creation for $9.99 deal, and let me tell you, it's a game-changer for anyone on a budget!Pros:Sound Quality: Surprisingly crisp and clear! I tested it out while making my content– no complaints. Definitely exceeded my expectations at this price point.Wireless Range: Decent range for its size. I could move around without losing signal, which is perfect for those who like to groove while they work or present.Battery Life: Holds up well. I used it for a couple of hours without any issues. Just what you need for extended use without the hassle of constant recharging.Build Quality: Sturdy for the price. Don't let the low cost fool you; it feels more durable than expected. Good for regular use.Easy Setup: Took me literally seconds to connect to my device. No complicated instructions or technical hiccups. (A manual is still provided.)Cons:Design: It's a bit basic in terms of design, but hey, it's function over fashion, right? Personally I’d like color choice as well. (Blue 😉)Accessories: Comes with the basics – no fancy carrying case or additional accessories. But again, for $9.99, it's a minor sacrifice.For the price, this wireless microphone is an absolute steal. It does exactly what it's supposed to do – delivers clear audio, hassle-free setup, and decent wireless range. If you're on a tight budget or just need a reliable backup, go for it. Is it a professional-grade mic? No. But does it get the job done without breaking the bank? Yes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Really decent for what I paid for but the part that plugs in isn’t really sturdy it’s already bending and that concerns me. For now there good but I’m not sure how much use I’ll get. Also they don’t hold a charge very well and I hate that because right in the middle of recording a video it does die on me. The sound quality is ok but it does pick up on static kinda easily and idk I feel like the sound quality could be better

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars The Sound Quality is ok
reviews.reviewText: The mic was use on an iphone 12pro. I rated a one star because i was hopefully the mic would be clear but the mic timbre sounded moufful, distant, and cover. No matter where i clip the mic on my shirt or on the table it does not sound smooth and clear as i expected. I already have an iphone wired mic which sounded way better than the wireless mic. It is clear and consistent. I guess you pay for what you get. Besides the mic quality, i like the friendly plug and play. You only need to charge the mic not the receiver.
